_header: My flesh that wroght was in Mary blood

OxfMert248.First Lines:
My flesse þat wrothe was in mari blodeMy flesse þat deyt
                    pyfulle vp pon þe rode…
OxfMert248.Last Lines:
…yt quiqe vs þat war dedelyyt gladed vs þat war
                    sory
OxfMert248.Attributed Title:
Caro mea vere cibus (f. 167ra); My flesse esse sowfast
                    mete et cetera (f. 167ra)
OxfMert248.Editions:
Coxe,  Henry Octavius. 
             Catalogus codicum mss. qui in collegiis aulisque
                oxoniensibus….
         Oxon: e Typographeo academico, 1852: 1.97 (4 lines only).
